formats.description: List of formats that are available for this texture set

atlas.description: `true` is texture contains an atlas. Viewer should turn off anisotropic filtering for atlases to avoid sampling artifacts. default=`False`

examples.title: Texture set definition (desktop: jpg+dds)
examples.description: For a mesh with `material.resource=888`, JPEG will be at `/layers/0/nodes/888/textures/0` and DDS at `/layers/0/nodes/888/textures/0_0_1`

examples.title: Texture set definition with ETC2 compresses image (Mobile: jpg+ktx-etc2)
examples.description: JPEG texture will be at `/layers/0/nodes/{nodes[i].material.resource}/textures/0`. Same texture in KTX format will be at  `/layers/0/nodes/{nodes[i].material.resource}/textures/0_0_2`
